# speakableGroupNames

**Instance Property**

The names of any groups associated with the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var speakableGroupNames: [INSpeakableString]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more strings, your search should return only messages that sent to the specified groups. Use the operator in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/speakableGroupNamesOperator] property to determine whether to search for messages containing all, some, or none of the specified groups.

## Getting the Senders and Recipients

- **recipients**: The contacts who are the recipients of the messages.
- **recipientsOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the recipients in the search criteria.
- **senders**: The senders to include or exclude when you search for messages.
- **sendersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the senders in the search criteria.
- **speakableGroupNamesOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.
